rule.name: EMS_EMSDetails
rule.description: "Base" interface module, with all the basic fields of the record. Used by the Summary record view, create/update, and task forms.
rule.definition: load( /* The local variables store the options for the Pick Single / Multiple from List fields * * We only show the active options, plus any inactive options already stored on this record */ local!EMS_statusOptions: if(ri!record.EMS_status.active,#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16231"(#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16263"(), null),#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16231"(#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16263"(), ri!record.EMS_status.value)), local!EMS_priorityOptions: if(ri!record.EMS_priority.active,#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16231"(#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16264"(), null),#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16231"(#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16264"(), ri!record.EMS_priority.value)), local!EMS_departmentOptions: if(ri!record.EMS_department.active,#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16231"(#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16265"(), null),#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16231"(#"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16265"(), ri!record.EMS_department.value)), { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: ri!label, firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Employee Name", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), instructions: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), helpTooltip: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), placeholder: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.employeeName, saveInto: ri!record.employeeName, readOnly: ri!readOnly, validations: if( len(ri!record.employeeName) <= 200, "", "Value may not be longer than 200 characters. You have entered " & len(ri!record.employeeName) & " characters." ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Date Of Birth", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), instructions: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), helpTooltip: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), /*required: not(ri!readOnly),*/ value: ri!record.dateOfBirth, saveInto: ri!record.dateOfBirth, readOnly: ri!readOnly ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Total Experience", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), instructions: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), helpTooltip: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), placeholder: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), required: false, value: ri!record.totalExperience, saveInto: ri!record.totalExperience, readOnly: ri!readOnly, validations: if( len(ri!record.totalExperience) <= 200, "", "Value may not be longer than 200 characters. You have entered " & len(ri!record.totalExperience) & " characters." ) ), if( ri!readOnly, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Status", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!record.EMS_status.value, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Status", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "", helpTooltip: "", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: local!EMS_statusOptions.value, choiceValues: local!EMS_statusOptions, required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.EMS_status, saveInto: ri!record.EMS_status ) ), if( ri!creating, {}, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( label: "Created By", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"( label: #"97597486-ded5-4b50-a2f8-f297f610d000_FORMATNAME"(ri!record.createdBy), user: ri!record.createdBy ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Created On", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), value: #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16226"(ri!record.createdOn), readOnly: true ) } ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Email", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), instructions: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), helpTooltip: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), placeholder: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.email, saveInto: ri!record.email, readOnly: ri!readOnly, validations: if( len(ri!record.email) <= 200, "", "Value may not be longer than 200 characters. You have entered " & len(ri!record.email) & " characters." ) ), if( ri!readOnly, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Department", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", value: ri!record.EMS_department.value, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Department", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "", helpTooltip: "", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: local!EMS_departmentOptions.value, choiceValues: local!EMS_departmentOptions, required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.EMS_department, saveInto: ri!record.EMS_department ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"( label: "Relative Experience", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), instructions: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), helpTooltip: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), placeholder: if(ri!readOnly, "", ""), required: false, value: ri!record.relativeExperience, saveInto: ri!record.relativeExperience, readOnly: ri!readOnly ), if( ri!readOnly, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField"( label: "Priority", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", images: #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16240"(ri!record.EMS_priority.value), size: "ICON" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Priority", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "", helpTooltip: "", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: local!EMS_priorityOptions.value, choiceValues: local!EMS_priorityOptions, required: not(ri!readOnly), value: ri!record.EMS_priority, saveInto: ri!record.EMS_priority ) ), if( ri!creating, {}, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( label: "Updated By", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_userRecordLink"( label: #"97597486-ded5-4b50-a2f8-f297f610d000_FORMATNAME"(ri!record.updatedBy), user: ri!record.updatedBy ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Updated On", labelPosition: if(ri!readOnly, "ADJACENT", "ABOVE"), value: #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16226"(ri!record.updatedOn), readOnly: true ) } ) } ), #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16239"( documents: ri!documents, deletedDocuments: ri!deletedDocuments, readOnly: ri!readOnly, target: if(ri!creating, #"_a-0001dda0-2f73-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_16217", ri!record.folderId ) ) } )
